name: Natural Language Dates Plugin
author: Argentina Ortega Sainz
description: Create date-links based on natural language

name: Hotkeys++
author: Argentina Ortega Sainz
description: Additional hotkeys to do common things in Obsidian

name: Obsidian Git
author: Denis Olehov
description: Backup your vault with git.

name: Paste URL into selection
author: Denis Olehov
description: Paste URL "into" selected text.

name: Sliding Panes (Andy Matuschak Mode)
author: death_au
description: Sliding Panes (Andy Matuschak Mode) as a plugin

name: Show Whitespace
author: death_au
description: Show whitespace in the editor

name: Advanced Tables
author: Tony Grosinger
description: Improved table navigation, formatting, and manipulation

name: Note Refactor
author: James Lynch
description: Extract note content into new notes and split notes

name: Calendar
author: liamcain
description: Simple calendar widget for Obsidian

name: Text {{expand}}
author: MrJackphil
description: Search and paste/transclude links to founded files

name: Jump to link
author: MrJackphil
description: This plugin allows open a link in current document using hotkey

name: Backlinks into the document
author: MrJackphil
description: A hacky workaround which put backlinks section into the document

name: Reading Time
author: avr
description: Add the current note's reading time to Obsidian's status bar

name: Todoist Sync Plugin
author: jamiebrynes7
description: Materialize Todoist tasks within Obsidian notes.

name: Vimrc Support
author: esm
description: Auto-load a startup file with Obsidian Vim commands.

name: Shortcuts extender
author: kitchenrunner
description: Use shortcuts for input special symbols without language switching

name: Add links to current note
author: MrJackphil
description: This plugin adds a command which allows to add a link to the current note at the bottom of selected notes

name: Quick Switcher++
author: darlal
description: Enhanced Quick Switcher, search open panels, and symbols.

name: Day Planner
author: James Lynch
description: An Obsidian plugin for day planning and managing pomodoro timers from a task list in a Markdown note.

name: Editor Syntax Highlight
author: death_au
description: Show syntax highlighing in code blocks the editor

name: Review
author: ryanjamurphy
description: Add a link to the current note to a daily note on a future date (or a past date, you time traveller).

name: Discord Rich Presence
author: Luke Leppan
description: Update your Discord Status to show your friends what you are working on in Obsidian.

name: Templater
author: SilentVoid
description: Create and use templates

name: Convert url to preview (iframe)
author: FHachez
description: Convert an url (ex, youtube) into an iframe (preview)

name: Copy button for code blocks
author: Daniel Brandenburg
description: Copy button for code blocks

name: Search++
author: Noureddine Haouari
description: Allow inserting text context search results on the active note, the plugin is based on the plugin mrj-text-expand-witb-text of MrJackphil.

name: Better Word Count
author: Luke Leppan
description: Counts the words of selected text in the editor.

name: Workbench
author: ryanjamurphy
description: Keep a workbench of knowledge materials.

name: Latex Environments
author: Zach Raines
description: Allows to quickly insert and change latex environments within math environments.

name: RTL Support
author: esm
description: Right to Left (RTL) text direction support for languages like Arabic, Hebrew and Farsi.

name: Markdown prettifier
description: Fix and reformats ugly Markdown.
author: pelao
